collectible.title: Homs Sabre
collectible.subtitle: There is a certain knack to using it.
collectible.text: A weapon Dunban used in the Battle of Colony 9, after Shulk took hold of the Monado. Technically speaking, although it's called a sabre, it's more of a katana design.

collectible.title: Colony Boxers
collectible.subtitle: Finely crafted undergarments (no gem slots).
collectible.text: Boxers that were originally worn by Dunban. Made of finely harvested Cotton Branch and fabricated with Homs weaving techniques, these are typical underwear for men in the Colonies on lower Bionis regions.
collectible.unlock: Witness Mari Setogaya remove Dunban's boxers for him. (She must be in her default or Casual Vampire outfit and standing next to him.)
